messages.subject: Help with reading Soshu Script
messages.msgSnippet: I am trying to translate two signatures in Soshu script for a friend. If anyone is confident in their ability to read Soshu script, could you please contact me
messages.messageBody:
I am trying to translate two signatures in Soshu
script for a friend. If anyone is confident in their
ability to read Soshu script, could you please contact
me off list?

This would be a big favor, as I haven't reached the
point where I can hack Soshu script.

Thanks,

Curran
